# web-animation-view-transitions

View Transitions API patterns - same-document transitions, cross-document MPA transitions, shared element animations, pseudo-element styling, accessibility

## Tags

`view-transitions` `page-transitions` `shared-element` `hero-animation` `spa-transitions` `mpa-transitions` `css-animations`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["web-animation-view-transitions"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.
